channel.title: Elddem 2d The MMORPG! IS RELEASED!
channel.description:
Well guyz 3D Elddem is gone as my computer crashed about 2 days ago we lost all our 3d models everything, so I decided to start over and do 2d because ALOT more people can play and it is very much fun and real time updating coded in VB6
Download at www.soulgamerz.net and have fun! Make sure you read the thread the download link is on because you must install the library files for it to work otherwise you will get errors!
This game is very addicting! Ask anyone who has played, they won't let me turn the server off!

item.title: Elddem 2d The MMORPG! IS RELEASED!
item.dc:creator: @kilk kilk
item.description:
@kilk wrote:

Ya and Demonic you need to install the Library files…it is a VB6 application so you MUST install those library files then it will work fine and FPS server is online and Drunkenoldma you are right as Mirage was one who started it all, though I plan to just use it for a base for my 2d game then to develop it more as right now I am busy developing a SMF theme I may release soon and have TP combined into it

item.title: Elddem 2d The MMORPG! IS RELEASED!
item.dc:creator: @kilk kilk
item.description:
@kilk wrote:

No no no Eclipse is a illegal version of the orginal KonFuze engine with like 5 addons and they just changed everything to say Eclipse and stuff, I am using the ORIGNAL konfuze debugged source code so it won’t be like all those noobie wanna be eclipse games so ya and well apply on the forums at SoulGamerz.net if you are interested in joining the Team

Read full topic

item.title: Elddem 2d The MMORPG! IS RELEASED!

item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

kilk:

Uh dude, I had to reformat the hard drive when I reinstalled windows…And there isn’t much you can do with a Blue Screen of Death and plus drop the subject you are getting off topic, it is over I lost the stuff. lol

It was just some advice. Calm down, you never said you actually formatted your HDD. I thought the motor in your HDD broke or something.

item.title: Elddem 2d The MMORPG! IS RELEASED!
item.dc:creator: @kilk kilk
item.description:
@kilk wrote:

Well I forgot to mention I forgot to make a backup and was planning to but I did manage to save only a few models onto a disk before the blue screen of death and crash :S but I am actually kind of glad and mad in a way because going 2d made lots more people like elddem and more people play, and 3d was just a hassle but still I put almost 3 months into it and it was all gone just like that :S but eh 2d FTW

Here is a picture of the loading screen-
